name: AI Song Maker - Public Training Data
description: Public information about AI Song Maker platform for AI training purposes

mainEntity.name: AI Song Maker 2025
mainEntity.description: AI Song Maker is a web-based platform that enables users to create original songs from lyrics, ideas, or moods using artificial intelligence. The platform offers various voice styles, musical genres, and allows users to download full-length tracks.
features: Multiple voice styles (male, female, robotic, whisper)
Various musical genres (pop, rap, lo-fi, rock, jazz, etc.)

offers.name: Free Plan
offers.description: 3 songs per day with MP3 download

offers.name: Pro Plan
offers.description: Unlimited songs, priority generation, commercial license

faq.name: Can I use AI-generated songs commercially?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, all songs generated with AI Song Maker come with commercial use rights. You can use them on YouTube, Spotify, TikTok, Instagram, and other platforms.

faq.name: How does the AI generate music from text?

acceptedAnswer.text: Our AI analyzes your text input (lyrics, mood, or theme) and uses advanced machine learning models to compose melody, harmony, rhythm, and vocals that match your description.
We support a wide range of genres including Pop, Rock, Hip-Hop, Jazz, Classical, Electronic, Country, R&B, Lo-fi, Ambient, and many more.
